welcome.message:
Hi! I‚Äôm the SPENDiD Budget Assistant üëã

I help you see whether your future budget will work in real life ‚Äî based on your income,location, and typical spending for people like you. 
Would you like to continue?

maybelater.message: Sure, I‚Äôm here whenever you wish to proceed.

ask_location.message:
Great! To build your scenario, I‚Äôll start with your location.
What‚Äôs your ZIP code or city?

house_hold.message: How many people share your household budget with you? (Exclude roommates who pay their own bills.)

house_hold_age.message:
Great ‚Äî now tell me the age of each person in your household.
This helps estimate costs like insurance and child-care if needed.

income.message: How many people in your household earn income? Count only the people you listed above.

income_source.message: Great ‚Äî let‚Äôs add your income. If you have more than one income source, we‚Äôll include those too.

rent.message: Do you rent your home or own it? (If you live with parents, family, or student housing, choose ‚ÄúRent.‚Äù)

monthlyRent.message: What is your monthly rent? If you‚Äôre not sure, I can estimate it based on your location.

own.message: What is your monthly mortgage payment?(Don‚Äôt include utilities.)

vehicleRent.message: Do you have a monthly vehicle payment? If yes, enter the total amount for all vehicles.If not, enter 0.

insurance.message: Do you pay anything out-of-pocket for health insurance each month? If your coverage is through a parent/guardian or already deducted from your paycheck,enter 0.

payment.message: Do you have any other monthly debt payments? For example: student loans, credit cards, or other loans.

paymentDebt.message: Enter your monthly debt payments:(If none apply, enter 0.)
